page.title: 02Ownership of Pets
page.content: A random survey of a sample of householders in the area showed that 65% had a pet of some kind.The most popular pets were dogs,cats being the next most popular. The survey of 54 householders showed the following numbers of different pets:- DOGS 21 Each figure denotes CATS 15 one household that RABBITS 5 keeps a particular GOLDFISH 4 type of pet but does HORSES 2 not account for the GEESE 2 number of that pet CHICKENS 2 kept. HAMSTERS 1 PARROTS 1 BUDGERIGARS 1 DUCKS 1 TORTOISES 1 No pets 19 CANARIES 1
